title: San Miguel beer label
content:
On the artwork supplied duplicating letters have the same 'worn' look to them down to where the holes are exactly so that makes me think this is a font. Can anyone identify it for me please?

Thanks  
Jason

Font: 

 Google Spies 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064626/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FIESTA.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064626/http:/typophile.com/files/FIESTA_0.jpg) | 778.21 KB |
author: byngo

comments.content:
Perfect match is **Google Spies** by HypeFonts . Looks like some sort of post-treated [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064626/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/compacta) with a custom /G (borrowed elsewhere?).  
I prefer not linking directly to the font as many HypeFonts look like roughened versions of commercial typefaces. Clearly not sure everything's completely legal over there...
